services.name: Teeth Cleaning
services.description: Professional dental cleaning service including thorough plaque and tartar removal, polishing, fluoride treatment, and gum health assessment. Our gentle cleaning process ensures maximum comfort while achieving optimal oral hygiene.

services.name: Root Canal Treatment
services.description: Comprehensive root canal therapy performed using advanced techniques and technology. Includes complete removal of infected pulp, thorough cleaning of root canals, medication, and permanent filling to prevent future infections.

services.name: Teeth Whitening
services.description: Professional-grade teeth whitening treatment using advanced LED technology and premium whitening agents. Includes customized treatment plan, protective measures for sensitive teeth, and post-treatment care instructions.

services.name: Dental Implants
services.description: Complete dental implant procedure including consultation, 3D imaging, surgical placement of titanium implant, custom crown creation, and final fitting. Includes follow-up care and maintenance instructions.

services.name: Dental Crown
services.description: Custom-made dental crown fitting including preparation, digital impressions, temporary crown placement, and permanent crown installation. Made from high-quality porcelain or ceramic materials for durability and natural appearance.

services.name: Invisalign Treatment
services.description: Complete Invisalign clear aligner therapy including 3D scanning, customized treatment plan, regular progress checks, and retainers. Perfect for achieving a straight smile discreetly.

services.name: Dental Bridges
services.description: Fixed dental bridge procedure including preparation of adjacent teeth, custom bridge fabrication, and precise fitting. Includes follow-up adjustments and care instructions.

services.name: Wisdom Teeth Removal
services.description: Complete wisdom teeth extraction service including consultation, X-rays, surgical removal, and post-operative care. Includes sedation options and detailed recovery instructions.

services.name: Dental Veneers
services.description: Premium porcelain veneer service including consultation, custom design, temporary veneers, and permanent installation. Transform your smile with natural-looking, durable veneers.

services.name: Gum Disease Treatment
services.description: Comprehensive periodontal treatment including deep cleaning, root planing, antibiotic therapy, and maintenance plan. Designed to restore gum health and prevent disease progression.

services.name: Emergency Dental Care
services.description: 24/7 emergency dental services including immediate pain relief, trauma treatment, and temporary restorations. Priority scheduling for urgent dental problems.

services.name: Dental Sealants
services.description: Protective sealant application including cleaning, preparation, and application of dental grade sealants. Ideal for cavity prevention in children and adults.

services.name: Dentures
services.description: Custom denture fitting service including measurements, impressions, fittings, and adjustments. Choose from full or partial dentures with natural-looking results.

services.name: Dental X-Rays
services.description: Comprehensive digital X-ray service including bitewing, panoramic, and 3D imaging options. Includes detailed analysis and explanation of findings.

services.name: Pediatric Dentistry
services.description: Child-focused dental care including cleanings, fluoride treatments, and cavity prevention. Specially designed to make dental visits fun and comfortable for kids.

services.name: Night Guards
services.description: Custom-fitted night guard including consultation, impressions, and fitting. Protect your teeth from grinding and clenching during sleep.

services.name: Smile Makeover
services.description: Comprehensive smile transformation including consultation, digital planning, and combination of cosmetic procedures. Create your perfect smile with our expert team.

services.name: TMJ Treatment
services.description: Complete TMJ disorder treatment including evaluation, custom treatment plan, and therapy options. Includes exercises, appliances, and follow-up care.

services.name: Dental Bonding
services.description: Cosmetic bonding procedure including tooth preparation, composite application, and finishing. Perfect for repairing chips, gaps, and minor imperfections.

services.name: Oral Cancer Screening
services.description: Thorough oral cancer screening using advanced detection technology. Includes comprehensive examination of oral tissues and detailed risk assessment.
